channel.title: Projects on CMSC320 Introduction to Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on CMSC320 Introduction to Data Science

item.title: Bonus Project: classification
item.description: POSTED: May 1, 2019 LAST UPDATE: May 14, 2019 DUE: May 17, 2019 An experiment on classification. Instructions here Submission Prepare and knit a single Rmarkdown file that includes submission information described above. All axes in plots should be labeled in an informative manner. Your answers to any question that refers to a plot should include both (a) a text description of your plot, and (b) a sentence or two of interpretation as it relates to the question asked.

item.title: CMSC320 Projects
item.description: Data scraping and cleaning Due March 9, 2020 Data wrangling and EDA Due April 3, 2020 Regression Due April 21, 2020
